title: Why am I sick of listening to music all of a sudden? I used to love listening to my music but I don't feel the desire anymore. - Quora

response.answer_text: I mean everyone will get tired a listening to music constantly. Sometimes i will need to take break and either completely stop listening to music, or just listen to it a little a day. Then after not listening for a little bit, i will want to listen to music more and more and so on. I (j)hope i helped you :) xoxo•maleah
